text: Fatimah Muhammad Sha'ban (born 1965) is an Omani writer. She was the first Omani woman to publish a short story collection. ==Works== * Tariq al-nadam [Experienced through Sorrow], 1994 * Maw'id ma'a al-qadar [Meeting through Destiny], 2001 ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Omani writers Category:Omani women writers Category:Omani short story writers
title: Fatimah Muhammad Sha'ban
